title: Listener Stories: Vol. 67
description: Stop, drop and roll, everyone, it's almost our birthdays! We've all got a month to prepare. Today we're reading your stories of tarot card coincidences in our favorite mountain city, not-quite-psychic dreams, and a terrifying home invasion tale. Not to mention a Ghost Adventures plug at an EDM concert. We've also got some primo Coffey content... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
